column4: how can I find out what device a usb flash stick is that won't mount?
dmesg might also contain some clues.. or the syslog... do a "tail -f /var/log/syslog" and remove the drive and insert it again.. see what pops up
well I know it used to be /dev/sdb but I need to erase a partition on it and I refuse to do it without verfying size or something first, also  fdisk won't open ti
do the syslog thing I suggested..
nevermind I think I got  it thanks for the help
